name: plain cake
description: A modest chocolate cake with no icing added.  Nothing special, but some of the best you can get nowadays.  Besides, cake is cake!

name: nutriment
description: A crumbly white pill half the size of your thumb, packed with vitamins and calories.  Provides a whole day's nutrition in portable form, but it's a little hard to keep down, owing to the rancid taste and chalky texture.

name: dough
description: Flour mixed with water, kneaded into a gooey paste.  Being made properly, this dough can be used to bake bread more efficiently than with just flour.
